commandDescription: Splits globalvaluesettranslations into various csv files
dirFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for input globalvaluesettranslations. Default: '%s'
inputFlagDescription: Specify a globalvaluesettranslation file in input. Example: Admin.globalvaluesettranslation-meta.xml
outputFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for output globalvaluesettranslations. Default: '%s'
sortFlagDescription: Specify if split results must be sorted. Default '%s'
